definition: variant of 夾克|夹克[jia1 ke4]
phonetic character used in loanwords for the sound "jia", although 夹 is more common
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: This jacket comes in three sizes.
sentences.chinese: 本店這種茄克有三種尺寸。

sentences.english: Snowflakes clung to his eyebrows and to the fur trim of his jacket and cap.
sentences.chinese: 眉毛上掛着雪花，茄克的毛邊和帽子上都是雪。

sentences.english: Try on this jacket and see if it fits you.
sentences.chinese: 試試這件茄克，看看是否合身。

sentences.english: One of them also needs a new jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他們之中有一位也需要一件新茄克。

sentences.english: Please put on your jacket, it is cold outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很冷，請穿上茄克衫。

sentences.english: No , jackets are out of fashion now .
sentences.chinese: 不，現在茄克衫已經過時了。

sentences.english: He bleached the stains out of the jacket.
sentences.chinese: 他用漂白劑把茄克上的污漬除掉。

sentences.english: My new jacket is worth yuan.
You can wear this jacket inside out.
sentences.chinese: 這件茄克正穿反穿都可以。

sentences.english: He wears a jacket of sorts with patches at the elbows.
sentences.chinese: 他穿了一件肘部打着各種補釘的茄克衫。

sentences.english: I'm looking for a suede jacket.
You can try this jacket on for size.
sentences.chinese: 這件茄克您可以穿上試試大小。

sentences.english: I don't need a new jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我不需要一件新茄克衫。

sentences.english: And the lining of my husband's jacket has come unstitched.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫的茄克衫襯裏脫線了。

sentences.english: Customer: I like thellos jacket. Can I try it on?
sentences.chinese: 我挺喜歡這件茄克的，我可以嚐嚐嗎？

sentences.english: His jacket is better then mine.
